atlantis.framework.content

Class ContentManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • atlantis.framework.content.ContentManager

  • public class ContentManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A content manager for load images and sounds
    Author:
    Yannick

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> assets 
      protected int loadType 
      protected java.lang.String rootDirectory 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ContentManager()
      Create a new content manager who will load asset from an external folder named Content

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getLoadType()
      Gets the load type used by the content manager. 0 for an internal loading (in package) 1 for an external loading (out of package)
      java.lang.String getRootDirectory()
      Gets the root directory where assets are loaded
      <T> T load(java.lang.String assetName)
      Get an asset by its type and its name
      Song loadSong(java.lang.String assetName)
      Load a song from content folder.
      SoundEffect loadSound(java.lang.String assetName)
      Load an sound from the content folder.
      Texture2D loadTexture(java.lang.String assetName)
      Load an image from the content folder.
      void setLoadType(int loadType)
      Sets the load type.
      void setRootDirectory(java.lang.String rootDirectory)
      Sets the root directory used to load assets.

    • Method Detail

      • loadTexture

        public Texture2D loadTexture(java.lang.String assetName)
        Load an image from the content folder. If the image isn't already loaded it is loaded and added to the collection of assets.
        Parameters:
        assetName -
        Returns:
        an image

      • loadSound

        public SoundEffect loadSound(java.lang.String assetName)
        Load an sound from the content folder. If the sound isn't already loaded it is loaded and added to the collection of assets.
        Parameters:
        assetName -
        Returns:
        a sound

      • loadSong

        public Song loadSong(java.lang.String assetName)
        Load a song from content folder. If the song isn't already loaded it is loaded and added to the collection of assets.
        Parameters:
        assetName -
        Returns:
        Return a song.

      • setRootDirectory

        public void setRootDirectory(java.lang.String rootDirectory)
        Sets the root directory used to load assets. If you're using interal loading you must use the path of the package where you load the asset.
        Parameters:
        rootDirectory -

      • getRootDirectory

        public java.lang.String getRootDirectory()
        Gets the root directory where assets are loaded
        Returns:

      • setLoadType

        public void setLoadType(int loadType)
        Sets the load type.
        Parameters:
        loadType - the type of loading, internal = 0 (for applet), external = 1

      • getLoadType

        public int getLoadType()
        Gets the load type used by the content manager. 0 for an internal loading (in package) 1 for an external loading (out of package)
